thread.section_title: FreedomVoice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FreedomVoice | www.freedomvoice.com | 4 of 20
thread.title: Jerry Finley

author: Jerry Finley
title: Jerry Finley
text: At this point in time many companies are scrimping by taking their customer service overseas and many times we get technicians that do not speak good English and do not comprehend what we are trying to accomplish. Dealing with this company was like a breath of fresh air. The technician communicated very well and walked me through the entire set up with patience. It was obvious he knew what he was doing!
